transforms.result: *{margin:0;padding:0}.btn{background-color:aqua}.btn:hover{background-color:#90f;color:#fff;cursor:pointer}.btn-admin{background-color:#6b46c1;border-radius:.375rem;color:#fff;font-weight:600;padding:.5rem 1rem;text-align:center;transition:background-color .3s ease}.btn-admin:hover{background-color:#805ad5}.white-button{background-color:#fff;border:none;border-radius:.375rem;color:#805ad5;font-weight:600;min-width:100px;padding:.5rem 1rem;text-align:center;transition:background-color .3s ease,color .3s ease}.white-button:hover{background-color:#552fa5;color:#fff}.black-button{background-color:#000;border:none;border-radius:.375rem;color:#fff;font-weight:600;min-width:100px;padding:.5rem 1rem;text-align:center;transition:background-color .3s ease,color .3s ease}.black-button:hover{background-color:#552fa5;color:#fff}.red-button{background-color:#b00000;border:none;border-radius:.375rem;color:#fff;font-weight:600;min-width:100px;padding:.5rem 1rem;text-align:center;transition:background-color .3s ease,color .3s ease}.red-button:hover{background-color:#730000;color:#fff}.orange-button{background-color:#c89d1b;border:none;border-radius:.375rem;color:#fff;font-weight:600;min-width:100px;padding:.5rem 1rem;text-align:center;transition:background-color .3s ease,color .3s ease}.orange-button:hover{background-color:#b08400;color:#fff}.green-button{background-color:#00913c;border:none;border-radius:.375rem;color:#fff;font-weight:600;margin-bottom:20px;margin-top:20px;min-width:250px;padding:.5rem 1rem;text-align:center;transition:background-color .3s ease,color .3s ease}.green-button:hover{background-color:#236941;color:#fff}.big-center-text{font-size:1.875rem;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:1.5rem;margin-top:1.5rem;text-align:center}.input-field,.input-field-textarea{border:1px solid #d1d5db;border-radius:.375rem;font-size:1rem;line-height:1.5;padding:.5rem;transition:border-color .15s ease-in-out,box-shadow .15s ease-in-out;width:100%}.input-field-textarea{min-height:5rem;resize:none}.input-field-textarea:focus,.input-field:focus{border-color:#c025eb;box-shadow:0 0 0 .125rem rgba(37,99,235,.25);outline:0}.image{border-radius:8px;display:block;height:auto;margin:0 auto;max-width:100%;padding-top:5px}.rounded-center{border-radius:5px}
